p: MS/MS was operated in positive mode using the following operating parameters: gas temperature, 325 °C; gas flow, 10 L/min; nebulizer, 35 psi; capillary voltage, 4.0 kV; fragmentor voltage, 130 V; cell accelerator, 3 V; and dwell, 200 ms. Quantification transitions were set at m/z 278.2 → m/z 152.1 with fragmentation energy (FE) of 120 V and collision energy (CE) of 15 eV for ETV and m/z 230.0 → m/z 121.2 with FE of 120 V and CE of 15 eV for Osalmid as the internal standard (IS).
